channel.title: [PI] Modern Magic GFX Problem
channel.description: All modern magic spells always show as a fire spell of that type. So say i cast a water strike, it will show as a fire strike. Or a water blast, shows as a fire blast. Anyone know of a fix?

item.title: [PI] Modern Magic GFX Problem
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

All modern magic spells always show as a fire spell of that type. So say i cast a water strike, it will show as a fire strike. Or a water blast, shows as a fire blast. Anyone know of a fix?
